Contributor: Pennsylvania. Court of Common Pleas (Philadelphia County), publisher.;
Description: Text is a Declaration on the 4th of July, 1918, by men of many races in the U.S. to proclaim freedom and pledge their lives, fortunes and their sacred honor. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Philadelphia, Pa. : Court of Common Pleas,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: In a Congress, July 4, 1918
